0.text: [wave]Ugh.. My Head[/wave] What happened while I was asleep.

2.text: Uhmm.. I'm a mechanic in this ship

3.text: Seems kinda [color=red][shake]S U S[/shake][/color] to me!?

4.text: I have to be careful with this guy

5.text: [shake]WAIT!![/shake] What happened to the other crew?

6.text: I don't need to tell someone like you
